Text: The previous biggest UK peacetime repatriation was in 2017 when Monarch Airlines collapsed. The CAA had to organise flights home for 110,000 customers on specially chartered planes.
Cause: The previous biggest UK peacetime repatriation was in 2017 when Monarch Airlines collapsed.
Effect: The CAA had to organise flights home for 110,000 customers on specially chartered planes.
Sentence: <e1>The previous biggest UK peacetime repatriation was in 2017 when Monarch Airlines collapsed.</e1> <e2>The CAA had to organise flights home for 110,000 customers on specially chartered planes.</e2>
